# Jeffrey Hatch

 

[Town Council](https://www.salemnh.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=55)  
Title: Councilor

**Term Expires: March 2027**

Committee Representation:

- Economic Development Committee
- Municipal Building Advisory Committee
- Planning Board (Alternate)
